title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicola Rennie. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Rennie N (2022). simnetdemand: Simulate Network Demand. R package version 1.0.1, https://nrennie.github.io/simnetdemand/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {simnetdemand: Simulate Network Demand},   author = {Nicola Rennie},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.0.1},   url = {https://nrennie.github.io/simnetdemand/}, }

title: Simulate Network Demand
text: Install using:

title: Simulate Network Demand
text: Simulate forecast demand Calculate booking limits Simulate booking process

title: Aggregate booking horizon — agg_bh
text: function aggregates multiple time points booking horizon

title: Aggregate booking horizon — agg_bh
text: data Numeric vector demand bh_len Length booking horizon. Default 30.

title: Aggregate booking horizon — agg_bh
text: numeric vector

title: EMSR Limits — emsr_limits
text: function calculates EMSR booking limits

title: EMSR Limits — emsr_limits
text: fares Vector fares. means Vector demand mean forecast fare class. vars Vector demand variance forecast fare class. capacity nteger total capacity.

title: EMSR Limits — emsr_limits
text: numeric vector

title: Forecast demand — forecast_demand
text: function forecasts demand per fare class

title: Forecast demand — forecast_demand
text: cust Numeric vector customer arrivals per time period probs Numeric vector probability purchase fare class

title: Forecast demand — forecast_demand
text: numeric value.

title: Forecast demand by simulation — forecast_demand_sim
text: function forecasts demand per fare class

title: Forecast demand by simulation — forecast_demand_sim
code: forecast_demand_sim(   nsim = 100,   probs1,   probs2,   alpha = 200,   beta = 1,   a1 = 1,   b1 = 1,   a2 = 1,   b2 = 1,   phi1 = 0.5,   n = 3000,   hor_length = 30 )

title: Forecast demand by simulation — forecast_demand_sim
text: nsim Number simulations Default 100. probs1 Numeric vector probability purchase fare class customer type 1 probs2 Numeric vector probability purchase fare class customer type 2 alpha Shape parameter gamma distribution total demand. Default 200. beta Rate parameter gamma distribution total demand. Default 1. a1 Beta distribution parameter 1 customer type 1. Default 1. b1 Beta distribution parameter 2 customer type 1. Default 1. a2 Beta distribution parameter 1 customer type 2. Default 1. b2 Beta distribution parameter 2 customer type 2. Default 1. phi1 Percentage total demand customer type 1. Default 0.5. n Total number time points generated. Default 3000. hor_length Number points make booking horizon, Default 30.

title: Forecast demand by simulation — forecast_demand_sim
text: numeric value.

title: Get cumulative counts — get_cumulative_counts
text: function applies cumsum row dataframe matrix

title: Get cumulative counts — get_cumulative_counts
text: data numeric matrix dataframe

title: Get cumulative counts — get_cumulative_counts
text: matrix dataframe

title: nhpp — nhpp
text: function simulates non-homogeneous Poisson process.

title: nhpp — nhpp
code: nhpp(   alpha = 200,   beta = 1,   phi1 = 0.5,   a1 = 1,   b1 = 1,   a2 = 1,   b2 = 1,   n = 3000,   hor_length = 30 )

title: nhpp — nhpp
text: alpha Shape parameter gamma distribution total demand. Default 200. beta Rate parameter gamma distribution total demand. Default 1. phi1 Percentage total demand customer type 1. Default 0.5. a1 Beta distribution parameter 1 customer type 1. Default 1. b1 Beta distribution parameter 2 customer type 1. Default 1. a2 Beta distribution parameter 1 customer type 2. Default 1. b2 Beta distribution parameter 2 customer type 2. Default 1. n Total number time points generated. Default 3000. hor_length Number points make booking horizon, Default 30.

title: nhpp — nhpp
text: numeric value.

title: nhpprate — nhpprate
text: function determines rate non-homogeneous Poisson process.

title: nhpprate — nhpprate
code: nhpprate(A = 240, a = 1, b = 1, phi = 1, t = 1, n = 3000)

title: nhpprate — nhpprate
text: Mean total demand across customer types. Default 200. Beta distribution parameter 1. Default 1. b Beta distribution parameter 2. Default 1. phi Percentage total demand customer type. Default 1. t Current time point. Default 1. n Total number time points generated. Default 3000.

title: nhpprate — nhpprate
text: numeric value.
